SourceString: Shoot a large Ball of Magma that explodes on contact with enemies or obstacles.\r\nDeals <b>{data.Damage}|round()</> <me_FireDam>Fire Damage</> in a <b>{data.Radius_UI}|fmt(min_frac=1,max_frac=1)m</> radius.

On explosion the skill sends <b>{ProjAmountMin}|floor()</> to <b>{ProjAmountMax}|floor()</> rock fragments in all directions dealing <b>{Damage}|round()</> <me_PierceDam>Pierce Damage</> each.\n<b>+{MPCostMod}|round()</> Energy Cost.
On explosion the skill sends <b>{ProjAmountMin}|floor()</> to <b>{ProjAmountMax}|floor()</> rock fragments in all directions dealing <b>{Damage}|round()</> <me_PierceDam>Pierce Damage</> each.

<b>{DmgMod_UI}|round()%</> more Damage.
Refund <b>{MPRefundMod_UI}|round()%</> of Energy spent over <b>{Duration}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=1)s</>.
Gain <b>1</> <me_Overload>Overload</> per <b>30</> Energy spent.
<b>+{MPCostMod}|round()</> Energy Cost.
Refund <b>{MPRefundMod_UI}|round()%</> of Energy spent over <b>{Duration}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=1)s</>.\r\nGain <b>1</> <me_Overload>Overload</> per <b>30</> Energy spent.

Consume full <me_Overwhelm>Overwhelm</> for <b>{DmgMod_UI}|round()%</> more Damage, <b>{DmgMod_UI}|round()%</> more <me_AilmentChance>Ailment Chance</>, <b>{DmgMod_UI}|round()%</> more Area Radius and <b>{ProjSpdMod_UI}|round()%</> more Projectile Speed.\nTags: +<me_Overwhelm>Overwhelm</>

Consume full Overwhelm for <b>{DmgMod_UI}|round()%</> more Damage, <b>{DmgMod_UI}|round()%</> more <me_AilmentChance>Ailment Chance</>, <b>{DmgMod_UI}|round()%</> more Area Radius and <b>{ProjSpdMod_UI}|round()%</> more Projectile Speed.

Explosion deals <b>{DmgMod_UI}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=1)%</> of Energy spent on this skill as additional <me_FireDam>Fire Damage</>.\r\n<b>+{MPCostMod_UI}|round()%</> of Current Energy as Energy Cost.

Does not explode on contact with enemies.
Deals <b>{Damage}|round()</> <me_FireDam>Fire Damage</>
 every <b>0.5s</> in a <b>{Radius_UI}|fmt(min_frac=1,max_frac=1)m</> radius.
Limit: <b>1</>.
On use old orb explodes.
<b>{ExplosionDmgMod_UI}|round()%</> less Explosion Damage.
<b>{ProjSpdMod_UI}|round()%</> less Projectile Speed.
<b>{ProjRangeMod_UI}|round()%</> less Projectile Range.

Split the ground in front of you to deal <b>{data.Damage}|round()</> <me_StrikeDam>Strike Damage</> in a <b>{data.Length_UI}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=1)m</> line.\r\nThe fissure stays for <b>{data.Duration}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=1)s</> and <me_Slow>slows</> enemies by <b>20%</>.\r\nConsumes full <me_Overwhelm>Overwhelm</> for <b>50%</> more Damage.

<b>+{DurationMod}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=1)s</> Fissure duration.\r\nThe fissure is filled with lava and deals <b>{Damage}|round()</> <me_FireDam>Fire Damage</> every <b>0.5s</> with <b>{AilmentChance_UI}|round()%</> <me_AilmentChance>Ailment Chance</>.\r\n<b>+{MPCostMod}|round()</> Energy Cost.
The fissure is filled with lava and deals <b>{Damage}|round()</> <me_FireDam>Fire Damage</>\n every <b>0.5s</> with <b>{AilmentChance_UI}|round()%</> <me_AilmentChance>Ailment Chance</>.

Hitting a <me_Stun>stunned</> enemy triggers a shockwave dealing <b>{Damage}|round()</> <me_StrikeDam>Strike Damage</> in a <b>{Radius_UI}|fmt(min_frac=1,max_frac=1)m</> radius.\r\n<b>+{MPCostMod}|round()</> Energy Cost.
Hitting a <me_Stun>stunned</> enemy triggers a shockwave dealing <b>{Damage}|round()</> <me_StrikeDam>Strike Damage</> in a <b>{Radius_UI}|fmt(min_frac=1,max_frac=1)m</> radius.

Turns the skill into a melee slam attack dealing <b>{WeaponDmg_UI}|round()%</> Weapon Damage with <b>100%</> Weapon Speed and <b>6m</> Range instead.\r\nTags: +Melee Attack\r\nRequires Axe, Sword, Spear or Blunt Melee Weapon.

Split the ground in front of you to deal <b>{data.WeaponDmg_UI}|round()%</> Weapon Damage as <me_StrikeDam>Strike Damage</> in a <b>{data.Length_UI}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=1)m</> line.
The fissure stays for <b>{data.Duration}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=1)s</> and slowsenemies by <b>20%</>.
Consumes full Overwhelmfor <b>50%</> more Damage.
Requires Axe, Sword, Spear or Blunt Melee Weapon.
<b>100%</> Hit Damage converted to <me_PierceDam>Pierce Damage</>.\r\n<b>+{AilmentMod_UI}|round()%</> added Base <me_AilmentChance>Ailment Chance</>.\r\n<b>+{MPCostMod}|round()</> Energy Cost.
Deals <b>{DmgMod_UI}|round()%</> more Damage against <me_Channel>channeling</> enemies, <me_Stun>stuns</> them for <b>1s</> and refunds <b>{MPRefund_UI}|round()%</> Energy spent.
Consuming full <me_Overwhelm>Overwhelm</> also adds <b>+2</> fissures in a cone.
Consuming full <me_Overwhelm>Overwhelm</> also adds <b>+2</> fissures in a cone.

<me_FireDam>Fire</> Projectiles from above your head to target location where they explode dealing <b>{data.Damage}|round()</> <me_FireDam>Fire Damage</> in a <b>{data.Radius_UI}|fmt(min_frac=1,max_frac=1)m</> radius.

For every <b>{data.RequiredMP}|round()</> Energy you spend globally, Flame Volley gains <b>1</> stack of <me_Amplify>Amplify</> (Max <b>{data.MaxAmplify}|floor()</>).

Flame Volley has <b>10%</> more Cast Speed per <me_Amplify>Amplify</>. 
Whenever the abilitiy fires, lose <b>1</> <me_Amplify>Amplify</>.

Automatically fires at enemies in a <b>8m</> radius once every second while it has <me_Amplify>Amplify</>.\nFrequency is affected by Cast Speed.\nWhile equipped, loses <b>1</> <me_Amplify>Amplify</> every <b>{Interval}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=1)s</>.
Deals <b>{DmgMod_UI}|round()%</> more Damage per <me_Amplify>Amplify</>.\nCosts <b>+{AmplifyMod}|round()</> <me_Amplify>Amplify</> whenever it fires.

Spawn <b>200%</> more projectiles.
Additional projectiles don't cost <me_Amplify>Amplify</>.
Target locations are random.
You can move while <me_Channel>channeling</> with <b>20%</> reduced Movement Speed.
<b>{AmplifyMod_UI}|round()%</> chance to not lose <me_Amplify>Amplify</> on use.
<b>{ProjSpdMod_UI}|round()%</> more Projectile Speed.\n<b>{DmgMod_UI}|round()%</> more Damage and <me_AilmentChance>Ailment Chance</>.
When directly used generates <me_Overwhelm>Overwhelm</> on hit, not more than once every <b>{Interval}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=1)s</>.
Target enemy is Ignited for <b>{data.Duration}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=1)s</>.\nIgnited enemies take <b>{data.Damage}|round()</> <me_FireDam>Fire Damage</> every <b>0.5</> seconds.

When directly used this skill deals <b>{Damage}|round()</> <me_FireDam>Fire Damage</> to the target with <b>{AilmentChance_UI}|round()%</> <me_AilmentChance>Ailment Chance</>.\n<b>{DmgMod_UI}|round()%</> less <me_DoT>Damage over Time</>.
When directly used this skill deals <b>{Damage}|round()</> <me_FireDam>Fire Damage</> to the target with <b>{AilmentChance_UI}|round()%</> <me_AilmentChance>Ailment Chance</>.
When Ignite ends, it jumps to another enemy within <b>3m</>.\n<b>40%</> less Damage.
When Ignite ends it triggers an explosion dealing <b>{Dmg}|round()</> <me_FireDam>Fire Damage</> in a <b>{Radius_UI}|fmt(min_frac=1,max_frac=1)m</> radius.
Flame Volley has a <b>{Chance_UI}|round()%</> chance to apply Ignite on hit.

Emit an <me_Aura>Aura</> with a <b>18m</> radius.\r\nAura grants you and allies <b>{data.FireDmgIncrease_UI}|round()%</> increased <me_FireDam>Fire Damage</>.\r\nAura grants you and allies <b>{data.PhysDmgIncrease_UI}|round()%</> increased <me_Physical>Physical Damage</>.

When you are hit by an enemy within <b>3m</> deals <b>{Dmg}|round()</> <me_FireDam>Fire Damage</> with <b>{AilmentChance_UI}|round()%</> <me_AilmentChance>Ailment Chance</>.\r\n<b>+{ReservedMPMod}|round()</> Energy <me_Reserve>reserved</>.

When you are hit by an enemy within <b>3m</> deals <b>{Dmg}|round()</> <me_FireDam>Fire Damage</> with a <b>{AilmentChance_UI}|round()%</> <me_AilmentChance>Ailment Chance</>.\r\n<b>+{ReservedMPMod}|round()</> Energy <me_Reserve>reserved</>.

<me_Aura>Aura</> grants you and allies <b>+{ResMod_UI}|round()%</> <me_FireDam>Fire</> <me_Resistance>Resistance</> and <b>+{MaxResMod_UI}|round()%</> Maximum <me_FireDam>Fire</> <me_Resistance>Resistance</>.\r\n<b>+{ReservedMPMod}|round()</> Energy <me_Reserve>reserved</>.

<me_Aura>Aura</> grants you and allies <b>+{ResMod_UI}|round()%</><me_FireDam>Fire</> <me_Resistance>Resistance</> and <b>+{MaxResMod_UI}|round()%</> Maximum <me_FireDam>Fire</> <me_Resistance>Resistance</>.

<me_Aura>Aura</> grants you and allies <b>+{ArmorFlatMod}|round()</> <me_Armor>Armor</> and <b>{ArmorIncMod_UI}|round()%</> increased <me_Armor>Armor</>.\r\n<b>+{ReservedMPMod}|round()</> Energy <me_Reserve>reserved</>.
<me_Aura>Aura</> grants you and allies <b>+{ArmorFlatMod}|round()</> <me_Armor>Armor</> and <b>{ArmorIncMod_UI}|round()%</> increased <me_Armor>Armor</>.

<me_Aura>Aura</> grants you and allies <b>+{DmgMod}|round()</> Weapon <me_FireDam>Fire Damage</>.\r\nGrants you <b>100%</> Weapon Damage converted to <me_FireDam>Fire Damage</>.\r\n<b>+{ReservedMPMod}|round()</> Energy <me_Reserve>reserved</>.
<me_Aura>Aura</> grants you and allies <b>+{DmgMod}|round()</> Weapon <me_FireDam>Fire Damage</>.\r\nGrants you <b>100%</> Weapon Damage converted to <me_FireDam>Fire Damage</>.

<me_Aura>Aura</> grants you and allies <b>+{DmgMod}|round()</> Weapon <me_StrikeDam>Strike Damage</>.\r\nGrants you <b>100%</> Weapon Damage converted to <me_StrikeDam>Strike Damage</>.\r\n<b>+{ReservedMPMod}|round()</> Energy <me_Reserve>reserved</>.
<me_Aura>Aura</> grants you and allies <b>+{DmgMod}|round()</> Weapon <me_StrikeDam>Strike Damage</>.\r\nGrants you <b>100%</> Weapon Damage converted to <me_StrikeDam>Strike Damage</>.
<me_Aura>Aura</> grants an additional <b>{DmgMod_UI}|round()%</> increased <me_FireDam>Fire</> and <me_Physical>Physical Damage</>.\r\n<b>+{ReservedMPMod}|round()</> Energy <me_Reserve>reserved</>.

Conjure an Earthquake around you. 
Its effect increases in Stages for every <b>{data.ChargeTimePerStage}|fmt(min_frac=1,max_frac=1)s</> you <me_Channel>channel</>.
Releasing after reaching Stage <b>1</> deals {AbilityDamage[Dmg1]} in a <b>{data.Radius_UI}|fmt(min_frac=1,max_frac=1)m</> radius.
Deals <b>120%</> more Damage per additional Stage.
Stage <b>2</> <me_Stun>stuns</> for <b>0.6s</>.

While <me_Channel>channeling</>, enemies are <me_Slow>slowed</> by <b>{Slow_UI}|round()%</> within <b>{Radius_UI}|fmt(min_frac=1,max_frac=1)m</> of you.\r\n<b>+{MPCostMod}|round()</> Energy Cost.\r\n<b>+{MPTickCostMod_UI}|round()</> Energy Cost per second.

While <me_Channel>channeling</>, enemies are <me_Slow>slowed</> by <b>{Slow_UI}|round()%</> within <b>{Radius_UI}|fmt(min_frac=1,max_frac=1)m</> of you.\r\n<b>+{MPCostMod}|round()</> Energy Cost.\r\n<b>+{MPTickCostMod_UI}|round()</> Energy Cost per second.

Creates an aftershock <b>1s</> after release.
Deals <b>{Damage}|round()</> <me_StrikeDam>Strike Damage</> in a <b>{Radius_UI}|fmt(min_frac=1,max_frac=1)m</> radius once per Stage reached.
<b>+{MPCostMod}|round()</> Energy Cost.
<b>+{MPTickCostMod_UI}|round()</> Energy Cost per second.
<b>1s</> after release deals <b>{Damage}|round()</> <me_StrikeDam>Strike Damage</> in a <b>{Radius_UI}|fmt(min_frac=1,max_frac=1)m</> radius once per Stage reached.

After reaching Stage <b>1</>, while charging you gain <me_Unstoppable>Unstoppable</> and take <b>{DmgRedMod_UI}|round()%</> reduced Damage.\r\n<b>+{MPCostMod}|round()</> Energy Cost.\r\n<b>+{MPTickCostMod_UI}|round()</> Energy Cost per second.
After reaching Stage <b>1</>, while charging you gain <me_Unstoppable>Unstoppable</> and take <b>{DmgRedMod_UI}|round()%</> reduced Damage.
<b>+1</> Maximum Stage.\r\nWhen you gain a Stage, gain <me_Overwhelm>Overwhelm</>.
<b>{DmgOWMod_UI}|round()%</> more Damage per <me_Overwhelm>Overwhelm</>.\r\n<b>+{MPCostMod}|round()</> Energy Cost.\r\n<b>+{MPTickCostMod_UI}|round()</> Energy Cost per second.
<b>{ASMod_UI}|round()%</> more Action Speed.\r\n<b>+{MPCostMod}|round()</> Energy Cost.\r\n<b>+{MPTickCostMod_UI}|round()</> Energy Cost per second.

Active: On use grants <b>20%</> increased Movement Speed and <b>30%</> increased <me_FireDam>Fire Damage</> for <b>6s</>.

Passive: While Ring of Flame has <me_Amplify>Amplify</>, deals <b>{data.Dmg}|round()</> <me_FireDam>Fire Damage</> every <b>0.5s</> in a <b>{data.Radius_UI}|fmt(min_frac=1,max_frac=1)m</> radius around you. This deals <b>15%</> more damage and has <b>5%</> increased radius per <me_Amplify>Amplify</>.

Gains <b>5</> <me_Amplify>Amplify</> on use and while active gains <me_Amplify>Amplify</> for every <b>{data.RequiredMP}|round()</> Energy you spend globally.
Max <b>{data.AmplifyMax}|round()</> stacks. Stacks last <b>3s</>.
Turns the skill into a sustained skill, so it is always active.\nNo Cooldown. No bonuses on use.\nReserves <b>+60</> Energy.

Deals <b>{data.Dmg}|round()</> <me_FireDam>Fire Damage</> every <b>0.5s</> in a <b>{data.Radius_UI}|fmt(min_frac=1,max_frac=1)m</> radius around you. This deals <b>20%</> more damage and has <b>5%</> increased radius per <me_Amplify>Amplify</>.\n\nWhile active gains Amplifyfor every <b>{data.RequiredMP}|round()</> Energy spent. Max <b>{data.AmplifyMax}|round()</> stacks. Amplifystacks last <b>3s</> independently.

Enemies inside the <me_Aura>Aura</> get <b>{ResRed_UI}|round()%</> to <me_ColdDam>Cold</> <me_Resistance>Resistance</>, <me_FireDam>Fire</> <me_Resistance>Resistance</> and <me_Armor>Armor</> Value every second.\nMaximum is <b>{ResRedMax_UI}|round()%</>.
DevComment: we can add "thermal resistances" back in after we have the keyword hovers etc. just so it doesnt trip people up. especially for ppl with not great english i want to make it clear this means fire and cold as long as there is no way for them to check waht "thermal resistance" actually means in the game.

SourceString: Deals up to <b>{DmgMod_UI}|round()%</> more Damage to enemies closer to the center.\nPermanency: <b>+{ReservedMPMod}|round()</> Energy <me_Reserve>reserved</>.
Deals up to <b>{DmgMod_UI}|round()%</> more Damage to enemies closer to the center.
<b>{RadiusMod_UI}|round()%</> increased radius per <me_Overload>Overload</>.\n<b>{DmgMod_UI}|round()%</> more Damage per <me_Overload>Overload</>.

While Active grants <b>100%</> Weapon Damage converted to <me_FireDam>Fire</> and <b>{DmgMod_UI}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=1)%</> increased <me_FireDam>Fire</> Weapon Damage per <me_Amplify>Amplify</>.\r\nOn use gains <b>+{AmplifyMod}|round()</> <me_Amplify>Amplify</>.
On use gains <b>+{AmplifyMod}|round()</> <me_Amplify>Amplify</>.\nBuff grants <b>{DmgMod_UI}|round()%</> increased Damage.

The ground at target location breaks dealing <b>{dataDmgAlt2.StrikeMinDmgTotal}|round() - {dataDmgAlt2.StrikeMaxDmgTotal}|round()</> <me_StrikeDam>Strike Damage</> in a <b>{dataDmgAlt2.Radius_UI}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=1)m</> radius and roots for <b>{dataDmgAlt2.HitRootDurationTotal}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=1)s</>.
Stays active for <b>{dataActive.DurationTotal}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=1)s</>.
After activity ends, creates an Eruption dealing <b>{dataDmg.FireMinDmgTotal}|round() - {dataDmg.FireMaxDmgTotal}|round()</> <me_FireDam>Fire Damage</> in a <b>{dataDmg.Radius_UI}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=1)m</> radius.
Can be reactivated to end activity early.
Every Eruption deals <b>{Dmg}|round()</> <me_StrikeDam>Strike Damage</> in a <b>{Radius_UI}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=1)m</> radius
Main Eruption deals <b>{DmgMod_UI}|round()%</> more Damage per second of activity.

While active, for every <b>{MPRequired}|round()</> Energy you spend globally, cause another Eruption dealing <b>{Dmg}|round()</> <me_FireDam>Fire Damage</> in a <b>{Radius_UI}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=1)m</> radius

Turns the broken ground into a Lava Field.\nWhile active deals <b>{Dmg}|round()</> <me_FireDam>Fire Damage</> every <b>{Period}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=1)s</> in a <b>{Radius_UI}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=1)m</> radius\n<b>+{MPCostMod}|round()</> Energy Cost
While active deals <b>{Dmg}|round()</> <me_FireDam>Fire Damage</> every <b>{Period}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=1)s</> in a <b>{Radius_UI}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=1)m</> radius

After the main Eruption causes additional Eruptions in <b>{Period}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=1)s</> intervals dealing <b>{Dmg}|round()</> <me_FireDam>Fire Damage</> in a <b>{Radius_UI}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=1)m</> radius while active.

You are encased in stone for <b>{dataActive.DurationTotal}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=1)</>s.\nWhile encased you take <b>{dataBase.DmgReduction_UI}|round()%</> less Damage and cannot act.\nRecast or use a Movement Skill to cancel early.
Deals <b>{Ratio}</>% of the absorbed damage as additional <me_StrikeDam>Strike Damage</>.
While Encased, Buffs don\'t decay. <b>{DurationMod_UI}%</> less Stoneform duration.
On use <me_Cleanse>cleanse</> <b>{OverloadAmtCleansed}</> <me_Overload>Overload</>, recover <b>{EnergyPerCleansed}</> Energy for every <me_Overload>Overload</> cleansed.
When Stoneform ends it deals <b>{Dmg}|round()</> <me_StrikeDam>Strike Damage</> in a <b>{Radius_UI}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=1)m</> radius.
While active deals <b>{Damage}|round()</> <me_StrikeDam>Strike Damage</> every second in a <b>{Radius_UI}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=1)m</> radius.
You can <me_Channel>channel</> other abilities during Stoneform.\n<b>{DmgReduction_UI}|round()%</> less Damage reduction.
